channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot holes on this road, 27th February
item.description:
Several pot holes along this stretch of Marlborough Road. Getting deeper due to heavy vehicles using this road. Really dangerous for cyclists especially early mornings and evenings.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 94, Marlborough Road, Archway, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken drain on knee hill, 27th February
item.description:
Bad sunken drain on the left as you go down knee hill. Results in cars swerving into oncoming lane
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Knee Hill, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Speeding, 27th February
item.description:
Safety concern on Axminster Crescent. Lots of drivers us it to skip traffic on Okehampton Crescent and speed down the road with no speed control measures in place.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Axminster Crescent, East Wickham, Greater London
